findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to stop or pause transactions
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to halt or pause transactions.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the capability to transfer tokens from a specific address.

findings.title: Owner Transfer User's Tokens
findings.description: The owner can manipulate total supply which directly impacts token price and Market Cap.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the ability to increase fees beyond 25% of the current fee.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase the amount of liquidity taken by dev wallet more than a reasonable percent
findings.description: The contract owner has limited control over increasing liquidity taken by the developer's wallet, ensuring that it does not exceed a reasonable percentage.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to mint new tokens
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to mint new tokens.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to burn tokens from specific wallet
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the capability to burn tokens from a specific wallet.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to blacklist wallets from selling
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to restrict specific wallets from selling tokens.

findings.title: Manipulate Total Supply
findings.description: Owner is able to manipulate total supply which will have a direct impact on token price and Market Cap.

findings.title: Code Optimization
findings.description: There are code segments that could be optimized to reduce size, memory consumption, and execution time.
